patthana16.48:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.48:1.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.48:1.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.48:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
